segments.text: I'm looking at a kitchen scene, a simple line drawing, but so much is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The perspective is slightly angled, showing the sink and some cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Daylight streams in through an open window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see a woman standing there, busy with a plate and a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is entirely fixed on polishing that dish, completely absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink beside her is a disaster; water is gushing over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a wide, steady sheet, cascading onto the cabinets and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in the growing puddle, yet she shows no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly unaware of such an obvious issue right at their feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This complete obliviousness fills me with a sense of dread for the inevitable outcome.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The amount of water damage this will cause is going to be extensive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find the wastefulness of the running water quite disturbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a baffling sight, an adult so completely lost in a minor task while chaos erupts.
segments.speaker: PAR
